Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add comprehensive test suite with 139 tests for DocuFlow

Implement complete testing infrastructure with 77% initial pass rate:

Test Coverage:
- DocuWare connector: 28 tests (authentication, cabinets, dialogs, fields, uploads, table parsing)
- Field mapping service: 52 tests (auto-mapping, semantic matching, validation, type conversion)
- AI service: 28 tests (categorization, extraction, prompt building, response parsing)
- Upload routes: 20 tests (file upload, batch processing, status, downloads, error handling)
- Connector routes: 10 tests (connection testing, configuration, encryption)

Test Infrastructure:
- pytest.ini with test markers (unit, integration, connector, slow)
- conftest.py with comprehensive fixtures and mocks
- Sample test data for all models
- Environment variable setup for isolated testing
- Mock services for external dependencies (Anthropic, DocuWare)

Test Organization:
- Unit tests for individual components
- Integration tests for API endpoints
- Mocked external dependencies
- Edge case and error handling coverage

Updated .gitignore to exclude test artifacts and Windows temp files
